signatures.label: respond(ballerina/http:Response|string|xml|json|byte[]|ballerina/io:ReadableByteChannel|ballerina/mime:Entity[]? message)
signatures.documentation: Sends the outbound response to the caller.

parameters.label: message
parameters.documentation:
The outbound response or any payload of type `string`, `xml`, `json`, `byte[]`, `io:ReadableByteChannel`
            or `mime:Entity[]`
